executive_summary.overall_assessment: STRONG FOUNDATION WITH AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT
key_findings: FBP system implementation passes 100% of benchmark tests (39/39 tests)
All 18 Canadian fuel types correctly implemented and validated
Historical fire event validation frameworks established for 3 major fires
Simulation shows 63-131% error vs. actual fire spread (requires calibration)

fbp_system_validation.reference: Forestry Canada Fire Danger Group (1992). ST-X-3
